pullrequest.title: Handle mouse events in model editor schematic view

content.raw:
Besides the change of color for nodes and the change to dashed lines for edges, both of them get a "half bounding box", which has just the top and left edges and disappears after some mouse movements.

![schematicView.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1039310943-schematicView.png)
content.html: Besides the change of color for nodes and the change to dashed lines for edges, both of them get a "half bounding box", which has just the top and left edges and disappears after some mouse movements.
